short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to improve the way Blackbaud functions. Very customizable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that changes some of Blackbaud's features to be more user-friendly. More features to come. See more in the GitHub Repository: https://github.com/DogDoge0-0/Blackbaud-Plus/
